level.heading: Regulations adopted to implement this part.
level.text: The Zoning Commission and all other agencies that have authority to adopt regulations to implement the housing linkage policies shall adopt regulations to implement the provisions of this part.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 5-76, see notes following ยง 1-306.31.
For Law 12-275, see notes following ยง 1-306.31.
